slides.title: Scenic Coastal Beauty
slides.description: A picturesque town nestled along the stunning Irish coastline.

slides.title: Vibrant Fishing Harbor
slides.description: Explore the bustling harbor filled with colorful fishing boats and fresh seafood restaurants.

slides.title: Enchanting Cliff Walks
slides.description: Embark on breathtaking cliff walks offering panoramic views of the sea and surrounding landscapes.

slides.title: Gastronomic Delights
slides.description: Indulge in delectable seafood delicacies and savor the flavors of Howth.

slides.title: Historic Howth Castle
slides.description: Discover the rich history and architecture of Howth Castle and its enchanting grounds.

slides.title: Quaint Village Charm
slides.description: Immerse yourself in the charming village atmosphere with its cozy shops, cafes, and traditional pubs.
